text: Sano ŵandu ŵaakuŵa ali nkwalandanya achimmasyeto ŵao ni migongo (ja achimama ŵao pa chiŵako changaŵa nkutenda nao soni ulombela), kaneko ni kuusyausya yaŵaŵecheteyo; basi agopole kapolo nkanaiche mwakwayana (ni achiŵammakwaowo), jalakweji ni (misyungu ja Allah) jankuwundidwa najo, sano Allah abali syosope sya yankutenda aŵele Jwaasimanya chenene
